Class FlowLayout

A flow layout arranges widgets in a directional flow, much like lines of text in a paragraph.

OnSizeChanged(Widget, Vector2)

Handles widget's size change. Basically it should call InvalidateArrangement(), if the size change doesn't affect the widget size constraints.
